price: او را به شي پریکړه د عذاب پر دوی باندې له امله د ظلم د دوی، نو دوی به خبرې نه شي کولی.
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
